about_the_game:
Isles of Isvenness is a creature-collecting and resource-gathering idle game with uniquely designed free-floating island biomes that can be moved anywhere on your screen. Play as Kazu the adventurous doggo as you harness elemental aether across the Isles of Isvenness, summon and collect Aethlings, and advance through various progression milestones while focusing on other things.

Collect Aethlings and Harness Elemental Aether

Summon, collect, and deploy your Aethlings across the Isles of Isvenness to help gather elemental aether: Terra, Inferno, and Aqua. Utilize gathered aether to upgrade your Aethlings and grow your collection by unlocking new species and rarity forms. Participate in dynamic quests that occur at random timepoints to accelerate aether gathering.

Level up to Evolve the Isles of Isvenness

Unlock achievements as you reach progression milestones to gain experience. Level up to unveil new environmental features across the Isles of Isvenness and watch as each island develops into its distinct, vibrant habitat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-64 bit
  • Processor: CPU - Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU - NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K | AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 | Radeon RX 5500 XT or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: A creature-collecting and resource-gathering idle game featuring vibrantly handcrafted islands that are freely movable on your screen. Harness elemental aether, grow your creature collection, and achieve progression milestones at your own pace for a relaxing and rewarding gameplay experience.
